name: Up and Down the Word Ladder Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
First word of six letters -


Sums removed from bank account statement

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of five letters-

Bathroom fixture specifically for washing genital area

Third word of four letters -

Eating regimen to lose weight

Fourth word of three letters -

To make a knot

Fifth word of two letters -

Minimal information technology

Now add a letter to the previous answer to make a new three letter word - 

Metal coating, prevents corrosion in food containers

Seventh word of four letters -

A clue

Eighth word of five letters - 

Not day

Ninth word of six letters -

Greatly disliking

Final word of seven letters -

Having a wash
